title: Field to Fork: "Food Safety Inspections and Audit Requirements"

tasks.task: Set up a food safety plan for a food business.
subtasks: Identify the sectors of the food industry (agriculture, processing, retail, consumers).
Determine if the business is subject to government regulations (e.g., Good Agricultural Practices for farms, Good Manufacturing Practices for processors).
Follow private sector standards (e.g., HACCP, SQFS) for food safety management.
Adhere to食品安全检查和审计要求 (Government inspections and audits).
Understand government inspection processes (e.g., USDA, FDA, state, local inspections).
Follow private sector standards (e.g., GFSI, BRC) for additional safety measures.
Implement food safety plans (e.g., HACCP, GMP) and keep records.
Categorize products and determine appropriate standards (e.g., raw vs processed honey).
Clean and maintain equipment, tools, and facilities.
Hygiene practices for personnel and personal safety.

tasks.task: Wash hands and handle food safely.

subtasks: Ensure agricultural water is safe for produce.
